import React from 'react'; import {useSelector,useDispatch} from'react-redux'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {createOrder} from '../actions/orderActions' export default function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); if (!cart.paymentMethod){ props.history.push('/payment'); } const orderCreate = useSelector((state) => state.orderCreate); const { loading, success, error, order } = orderCreate; const toPrice = (num) => Number(num.toFixed(2)); cart.itemsPrice = toPrice(cart.cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.qty * c.price, 0)) cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? toPrice(0) : toPrice(7); cart.taxPrice = toPrice(0.20 * cart.itemsPrice); cart.totalPrice = cart.itemsPrice + cart.shippingPrice + cart.taxPrice; const dispatch= useDispatch (); const placeOrderHandler = () => { dispatch(createOrder({ ...cart, orderItems: cart.cartItems })); }; return (

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.fullName}
    Address: {cart.address}, {cart.city}, {cart.postalCode} ,{cart.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      {cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} x {item.price} Dt = {item.qty * item.price} Dt
      • ))}

  • Order Summary

  • Items
    {cart.itemsPrice.toFixed(3 )} Dt
  • Shipping
    {cart.shippingPrice.toFixed(3)} Dt
  • Tax
    {cart.taxPrice.toFixed(3)} Dt
  • Order Total
    {cart.totalPrice.toFixed(3)} Dt
) }
